abstract: Vincenzo Iaquinta (born 21 November 1979) is an Italian footballer who plays as a striker. He currently plays for KKS Lech Poznan having signed in March 2014. Prior to joining Juventus, he spent seven seasons at Udinese, including playing in the UEFA Champions League.Iaquinta played 40 matches for the Italy national football team between 2005 and 2010, scoring six goals. He was included in their squad which won the 2006 FIFA World Cup, as well as the team for the 2010 edition.
